author: Nicole Carpenter
title: Nintendo donated 9,500 masks to local coronavirus relief efforts
description: As the coronavirus pandemic continues to spread in the United States, masks are in short supply. Nintendo of America has donated 9,500 masks to local COVID-19 relief efforts to help its community in the state of Washington.
content:
Nintendo of America has donated more than 9,500 N95 respirator masks to coronavirus relief efforts in the state of Washington.
As COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus, continues to spread globally, masks are in short supply. Doctors, nurses, and o… [+1205 chars]
